TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Aes extends System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm

Docs.summary: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) must inherit.
